Welcome to pysal’s documentation!¶

PySAL is a cross-platform library of spatial analysis functions written in Python. It combines the development efforts on PySpace and STARS - Space Time Analysis of Regional Systems.

Contents:

  • Background
    • Research Papers and Presentations
  • File Input-Ouput
    • Introduction
    • Examples
  • Spatial Weights
    • Introduction
    • Contiguity Based Weights
    • Distance Based Weights
